text.section:
This section applies to property of:
a landowner;
the holder of an easement or right in the land of the landowner; and
the tenant of the landowner or of the holder of the easement or right in the land.

A district council may not prohibit the use of land subject to this section for:
farming or other agricultural uses; or
in Prince George's County, storage of natural or artificial gas at more than 500 feet below ground level.
